name: Lost In The Wild
description:
This is a 3D first-person shooting game. Players start the game on a small boat, shuttle between each island to collect gold coins and shoot enemies. The goal is to survive and finish collecting the number of gold coins to escape here.

 

Rules and Objects:

 Keyboard control: 

- Direction: W-A-S-D.

 -Shift: Speed up

 - Jump: Space.

- Press “1”: Mouse invisible.

- Press “2”: Mouse visible.

-Timer:

While the game starts, 100 is counting down. When it runs out (0), the game is over.

-Goal:

Collecting 10 coins.

-Enemy:

The enemy blocks your way. Shoot it, aim with a crosshair,when its health bar turns color from green to black, it disappears.  

Hint: you have to be close enough to the enemy to shoot, otherwise it will not lose life.

-Golden Coins:

Collect them for achieving a score goal （10 coins), when you touch the coin, it disappears and the score points on the top left of the screen will be plus 1. If the timer does not run out to 0, and you have 10 points, you win this game.

-Green Coins:

Another enemy without shooting. When you touch it, you die and the game is over.
